explains: adj. 相反的，相对的；乖戾的，好与人作对的；逆向的，逆行的
n. 相反的事实（或事情、情况）；对立命题，反对命题
wordGroup: quite the contrary 恰恰相反 ，正相反
to be contrary to 违背；与…相反

sentences.en: I don't find him funny at all. Quite the contrary.
sentences.cn: 正相反，我觉得他一点儿也不可笑。

sentences.en: Contrary to popular belief , many cats dislike milk.
sentences.cn: 与普通的看法相反，许多猫不喜欢牛奶。

sentences.en: Contrary to expectations , interest rates did not rise.
sentences.cn: 出乎意料的是利率并未上升。
